results.name: Continued fraction for sqrt(62).
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 1).
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
formula: a(n) = 1+(1+(-1)^n)*(9+4*i^n)/2 - 7*A000007(n), where i is the imaginary unit. - _Bruno Berselli_, Mar 08 2011 - Mar 15 2011
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 22000); x=contfrac(sqrt(62)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b010146.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 07 2009
xref: Cf. A010515 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 07 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
